gobblin.runtime.job_catalog

Class JobCatalogListenersList

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.job_catalog.JobCatalogListenersList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobCatalogListener, JobCatalogListenersContainer, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class JobCatalogListenersList
extends Object
implements JobCatalogListener, JobCatalogListenersContainer, Closeable
    A helper class to manage a list of JobCatalogListeners for a JobCatalog. It will dispatch the callbacks to each listener sequentially.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface gobblin.runtime.api.JobCatalogListener

        JobCatalogListener.AddJobCallback, JobCatalogListener.DeleteJobCallback, JobCatalogListener.UpdateJobCallback

      • getListeners

      • addListener

        public void addListener(JobCatalogListener newListener)
        Description copied from interface: JobCatalogListenersContainer
        Adds a JobCatalogListener that will be invoked upon updates on the JobCatalog. Upon registration JobCatalogListener.onAddJob(JobSpec) will be invoked for all pre-existing jobs in the JobCatalog.
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface JobCatalogListenersContainer

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(JobCatalogListener oldListener)
        Description copied from interface: JobCatalogListenersContainer
        Removes the specified listener. No-op if not registered.
        Specified by:
        removeListener in interface JobCatalogListenersContainer

      • onAddJob

        public void onAddJob(JobSpec addedJob)
        Description copied from interface: JobCatalogListener
        Invoked when a new JobSpec is added to the catalog and for all pre-existing jobs on registration of the listener.
        Specified by:
        onAddJob in interface JobCatalogListener

      • callbackOneListener

      • registerWeakJobCatalogListener

        public void registerWeakJobCatalogListener(JobCatalogListener jobListener)
        Description copied from interface: JobCatalogListenersContainer
        Like JobCatalogListenersContainer.addListener(JobCatalogListener) but it will create a weak reference. The implementation will automatically remove the listener registration once the listener object gets GCed.

        Note that weak listeners cannot be removed using JobCatalogListenersContainer.removeListener(JobCatalogListener).

        Specified by:
        registerWeakJobCatalogListener in interface JobCatalogListenersContainer
